QuestData.Title: Gaze of the Raven God
QuestData.Description: The Sethekk are breeding vile wind serpents from Sethe's blood and bones. With these creatures, they will tear apart the sky.$B$BThe nests are protected by powerful magic, but Anzu's gaze should penetrate them with ease.$B$BLet us visit the nests and destroy them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Eye of Anzu at $1oa Wind Serpent Nests.
QuestData.RewardText: <As the orb meets the altar, the nearby candles flare up.>
